CustomField.description: Used in the partner portal to display delinquency information on reports. This is an alternative to sharing accounts with partners.
CustomField.formula: "Contact Name: "& Account.Send_Bills_Contact__r.FirstName &" "& Account.Send_Bills_Contact__r.LastName & BR() & "Contact Email: " & Account.Send_Bills_Contact__r.Email &BR()& "Contact Phone: " & Account.Send_Bills_Contact__r.Phone &BR()& "Contact Mobile: " & Account.Send_Bills_Contact__r.MobilePhone &BR()& "Autopay: " & IF(Account.Recurring_Billing__c,"Yes","No") & BR() & "Account Balance: $" & TEXT(Account.Account_Balance__c) & BR() & "Account Number: " & Account.Account_Number__c
CustomField.label: Delinquency Information
